data.name: Paula's Choice RESIST Super-Light Wrinkle Defense SPF 30
data.description: A lightly tinted mineral-based formula that protects skin from sun damage and fortifies it with state-of-the-art antioxidants.

data.name: Belif The True Cream Aqua Bomb
data.description: An ultra-lightweight, gel-cream that instantly cools and refreshes skin while providing intensive hydration. This water-based moisturizer 'floods' the skin with a rush of refreshing hydration and minimizes the appearance of pores for soft, smooth, supple skin. Ideal for normal, combination, and oily skin types.

data.name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Fragrance Free
data.description: “The Red Jar” – known to many as their go-to, nonnegotiable face moisturizer with over 1 billion jars sold, Olay Micro-Sculpting Fragrance-Free Face Cream is designed to start visibly reducing wrinkles & fine lines starting day 1. Infused with Vitamin B3, Amino-Peptides, Hyaluronic Acid and Antioxidants for ultimate penetration, this moisture-binding moisturizing formula instantly hydrates to visibly firm skin for a lifted look."

data.name: Tatcha The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer
data.description: This lightweight, clarifying water cream releases a burst of hydrating nutrients and pore-refining botanicals for healthy aging and smooth, balanced skin.
ingredients: saccharomyces/camellia sinensis leaf/cladosiphon okamuranus/rice ferment filtrate*

data.name: Paula's Choice RESIST Skin Restoring Moisturizer with SPF 50
data.description: This antioxidant-rich moisturizer hydrates and protects with superstar ingredients like niacinamide, shea butter and licorice for flawless, younger-looking skin.

data.name: Peter Thomas Roth Water Drench Broad Spectrum SPF 45 Hyaluronic Cloud Moisturizer
data.description: Drench your skin with a liquid cloud of fluffy-light moisture that feels soft and weightless like clouds in the atmosphere, shielding against UVA/UVB rays while helping to keep skin hydrated during sun exposure with a 30% Hyaluronic Acid Complex. Non-greasy, cream-to-water invisible broad-spectrum SPF 45 sunscreen has a 30% complex of Hyaluronic Acid, a potent hydrator that draws in water. Helps plump the look of skin with moisture.

data.name: EltaMD UV Clear Broad-Spectrum SPF 46
data.description: Oil-free EltaMD UV Clear helps calm and protect sensitive skin types prone to discoloration and breakouts associated to acne and rosacea. It contains niacinamide (vitamin B3), hyaluronic acid and lactic acid, ingredients that promote the appearance of healthy-looking skin. Very lightweight and silky, it may be worn with makeup or alone. Choose from tinted and untinted formulas for use every day.

data.name: EltaMD UV Daily Broad-Spectrum SPF 40
data.description: Serious UV protection and superior hydration join forces in this sheer facial sunscreen. EltaMD UV Daily has hyaluronic acid to boost moisture retention and diminish fine lines. This lightweight moisturizer with UV protection can be worn alone or under makeup. Choose from tinted and untinted formulas for use every day.

data.name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Facial Gel Cream Extra Dry Skin
data.description: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel Cream Extra-Dry instantly quenches dry skin and keeps it looking smooth, supple and hydrated all day. Our unique light-weight formula absorbs quickly, like a gel, but has the long-lasting, intense moisturizing power of a cream, for even extra dry skin. It boosts skin's hydration level and locks it in all day. Formulated with hydrating hyaluronic acid, naturally found in skin, it acts as a sponge for dry skin cells, resulting in more supple and smooth skin.

data.name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser
data.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Foaming Cleanser's gently foams to deeply cleanse without disrupting the natural skin protective barrier. This refreshing gel, with 3 essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, effectively removes excess oil, dirt, and makeup.

data.name: Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Cleanser
data.description: Thoroughly cleanse and leave your skin feeling moisturized for naturally soft skin with NEUTROGENA® Ultra Gentle Daily Cleanser, Creamy Formula. This creamy cleanser works in an advanced, skin-friendly way. Uniquely formulated with minimal ingredients, this effective cleanser gently removes excess oil, dirt and makeup. NEUTROGENA® Ultra Gentle Daily Cleanser, Creamy Formula is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, fragrance-free, paraben-free, soap-free and dye-free.

data.name: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser
data.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser, effectively cleanses and hydrates without disrupting the natural skin protective barrier. This non-foaming lotion, with 3 essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, gently removes dirt and oil while increasing skin hydration after just one use.

data.name: Biore UV Aqua Rich Watery Essence SPF 50+ PA++++
data.description: Biore UV Aqua Rich Watery Essence has a light-weight feeling yet it effectively protects from strong UV rays, preventing aging skin and sunburn. This Japanese sunscreen features UV blocking ingredients such as water capsules which when applied to the skin create a pleasant, watery veil. The new formula is enhanced with the so called "Micro Defense" technology which prevents the formation of micro gaps and potential uneven coating. It also contains moisturizing ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, royal jelly and citrus essence to retain moisture.

data.name: Supergoop! Unseen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++
data.description: The original, totally invisible, weightless, scentless sunscreen with SPF 40 that leaves a velvety finish. This innovative, antioxidant-rich multitasker has a unique oil-free formula that glides onto skin while providing broad spectrum SPF 40 protection. Use it as a makeup-gripping primer under foundation when you want a little more coverage, or on its own if you want a more natural look. It’s a totally game-changing way to wear sunscreen every day, and it will have you SPF-Obsessed™.

data.name: Bioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water
data.description: This micelle solution is a soothing non-rinse cleanser and make-up remover. The perfectly cleanses and removes make-up from the face and eyes. Soothes irritated skin and minimises redness.

data.name: Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover
data.description: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.

data.name: Neutrogena All-in-One Makeup Removing Cleansing Wipes
data.description: NEUTROGENA® All-in-One Make-Up Removing Cleansing Wipes are soft, pre-moistened wipes, infused with a mild cleansing lotion. They not only gently and effectively cleanse and remove all types of make-up but also tone skin, leaving it refreshed in just one convenient step. Skin conditioning ingredients help prevent over-drying and leave your skin feeling soft and looking healthy. Gentle enough to use around sensitive eye area, even for contact lens wearers.

data.name: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser
data.description: A super gentle cleanser that's great for your morning wash this low pH formula gel cleanser doesn't strip your skin of its natural oils and contains purifying botanical ingredients and mild acids to gently cleanse your skin to its most supple and clear texture

data.name: Farmacy Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm
data.description: An award-winning makeup-removing face cleanser that melts away stubborn makeup, SPF, dirt, and oil and leaves skin hydrated with zero residue

data.name: Garnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water All-in-1 Sensitive Skin
data.description: Cleanse with care with Garnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water. Micellar cleansing water is a facial cleanser and makeup remover that is surprisingly powerful, yet gentle on skin. Garnier micellar water all-in-1 effectively cleanses, removes makeup and refreshes skin in one easy step. Like a magnet, micelles capture and lift away dirt, oil and makeup without harsh rubbing. It can be used to remove all traces of makeup, including waterproof eyeliners and longwear lipstick, dissolving all traces of makeup, dirt and oil. The mild formula is safe for all skin types, dermatologist-tested and free from parabens, sulfates, silicone and fragrance.

data.name: Sukin Sensitive Cleansing Gel
data.description: Our soap free Sensitive Cleansing Gel provides a gentle, non-drying cleanse to help remove impurities and excess oils. A blend of Green Tea, Cucumber and Avocado Oil work to gently clean, refresh and purify, leaving skin feeling soft, clear and balanced. This is the perfect cleansing option for combination/oily skin types who have sensitive skin.

data.name: Sukin Sensitive Facial Moisturizer
data.description: Our fast-absorbing Sensitive Facial Moisturiser helps deliver essential hydration to delicate skin. Rosehip, Sesame and Jojoba Oils help promote increased moisture levels, leaving skin feeling soothed and nourished.

data.name: Sukin Micellar Cleansing Water
data.description: Our Micellar Cleansing Water is infused with gentle Aloe Vera to thoroughly remove makeup and dirt build up, whilst soothing and purifying the complexion. A refreshing blend of Chamomile and Cucumber calms, leaving skin lightly hydrated and clean.

data.name: Olay Complete Lotion Moisturizer with SPF 30 Sensitive
data.description: Gentle with zinc oxide provides sun protection & long-lasting hydration for sensitive skin. Daily SPF moisturizer helps prevent premature skin damage with Broad Spectrum SPF 30 UVA/UVB Sunscreen. Conditions skin surface with Vitamin E & aloe to maintain healthy-looking skin. Oil-free, fragrance-free, non-greasy, dermatologically tested & non-comedogenic (won’t clog pores) formula for sensitive skin types. Nourishes 7 layers deep into skin’s surface to help protect beautiful, younger-looking skin.

data.name: CeraVe AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30
data.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30 provides UV protection while helping to restore the natural skin protective barrier. This lightweight, non-greasy lotion, with 3 essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, provides all day hydration after just one use.

data.name: Youth To The People Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser
data.description: An award-winning face wash with cold-pressed antioxidants to remove makeup, prevent buildup in pores, and support skin’s pH balance.

data.name: Farmacy Clearly Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm
data.description: A fragrance-free, PEG-free makeup removing cleansing balm that melts away stubborn eye and long-wear makeup, SPF, and dirt—made for sensitive and reactive skin.

data.name: Neutrogena Moisture Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF 30
data.description: NEUTROGENA MOISTURE® Oil Free SPF 30 is a lightweight, non-greasy formula that is clinically proven to provide long-lasting moisturization for softer, smoother, younger-looking skin.

data.name: The Ordinary Buffet Anti-Aging Serum
data.description: A multi-peptide, lightweight, water-based serum that targets multiple signs of visible aging at once and is great for those looking for solutions for signs of aging and supporting visibly healthy skin.

data.name: Paula's Choice SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant
data.description: Our #1 product worldwide + cult favorite, this gentle leave-on exfoliant with salicylic acid quickly unclogs pores, smooths wrinkles, brightens and evens out skin tone.
ingredients: camellia oleifera leaf extract (green tea/skin calming/antioxidant)

data.name: The Ordinary Alpha Arbutin 2% + HA Hyperpigmentation Serum
data.description: A concentrated serum with pure alpha arbutin and hyaluronic acid for more visibly even-toned skin.

data.name: The Ordinary Retinol 1% in Squalane
data.description: A highly stable, water-free solution of one percent pure retinol.

data.name: The Ordinary Salicylic Acid 2% Anhydrous Solution Pore Clearing Serum
data.description: A water-free serum formulated with salicylic acid to effectively decongest the skin and provide surface exfoliation.

data.name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 Hydrating Serum
data.description: A hydrating formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid.

data.name: Paula's Choice CLEAR Regular Strength Daily Skin Clearing Treatment with 2.5% Benzoyl Peroxide
data.description: An effective acne treatment that works immediately to fight acne, prevent future breakouts, and reduce redness.

data.name: Thayers Alcohol-Free Rose Petal Witch Hazel Facial Toner
data.description: Flower Power. Make your skin bloom with THAYERS Rose Petal Facial Mist. This pH balanced, gentle toner is derived from a time-honored formula, developed by Thayers to cleanse, tone, and moisturize skin. Formulated with Rose Water and Thayers unique, proprietary blend of Aloe Vera and non-distilled Witch Hazel that is grown exclusively for Thayers on a family farm. By avoiding distillation of their Witch Hazel, we’re able to preserve the naturally-occurring, beneficial tannins which are known to their antioxidant benefits. The Thayers toner formula imparts a natural glow to your skin. Thayers elixirs have been a fixture in medicine cabinets for generations – once you use them you’ll know why.
ingredients: hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel) bark/leaf/twig extract and aloe barbadensis leaf

data.name: Thayers Facial Toner with Witch Hazel Unscented
data.description: Thayers Alcohol-Free Unscented Witch Hazel with Organic Aloe Vera Formula Facial Toner has all the replenishing, revitalizing magic of our scented varieties, but is undetectable by the nose.
ingredients: certified organic witch hazel ext blend (hamamelis virginiana extract (witch hazel*)
aloe barbadensis leaf juice (filet of aloe vera*))

data.name: Pyunkang Yul Acne Toner
data.description: Acne Toner is a toner that has a refreshing feeling that helps sebum control and convergence.

data.name: Fenty Skin Hydra Vizor Invisible Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30
data.description: A refillable two-in-one sunscreen moisturizer that’s lightweight, oil free, noncomedogenic, and invisible—it targets dark spots, and is makeup-friendly.

data.name: SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic
data.description: CE Ferulic is a revolutionary antioxidant combination that delivers advanced environmental protection against photoaging by neutralizing free radicals that cause accelerated signs of aging. Provides advanced environmental protection against damaging free radicals induced by UVA, UVB, and infrared radiation. Increases firmness and replenishes lipids to visibly reduce wrinkles. Once absorbed, this serum can‚'t be washed or rubbed off- It remains effective for a minimum of 72 hours, making it an excellent addition to sunscreen.

data.name: Yes To Calming Toner Cucumbers
data.description: Refreshing, alcohol-free toner gently cleanses, removing residual oils, dirt and makeup without stripping the skin. Enriched with cucumber extract, witch hazel and aloe vera to help balance, tone, hydrate, nourish and calm sensitive skin.

data.name: I'm From Rice Toner
data.description: I'm From Rice Toner contains the best rice grown in Yeoju where is the origin of the rice. The immaculate rice called 'GOA RICE' delivers clean and clear skin and makes skin smooth so that skin is glowing from the inside of the skin. Experience the balanced skin with rice that is the most familiar and extraordinary ingredient from the nature in Korea.

data.name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel Cream SPF 25
data.description: A lightweight water gel formula is oil free and non-comedogenic and moisturizes to help revitalize the look of dull, tired skin. This moisturizer also provides broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection. Boost moisture with a complex of purified hyaluronic acid.

data.name: Stridex Medicated Acne Pads, Maximum Strength
data.description: Stridex Maximum Pads have the highest level of acne-fighting medicine allowed in a non-prescription formula (2% salicylic acid) and are recommended for cases of moderate acne. Max Pads have effective skin cleansers that work to remove dirt, oil, and sweat from the surface of the skin. The medication penetrates to unclog pores and dissolve deep-down oil. They even remove what soaps and face washes leave behind! Completely alcohol-free for acne-fighting effectiveness without the burn. Continues working between uses.

data.name: Elizavecca Witch Piggy Hell Pore Control Hyaluronic Acid 97
data.description: A powerful moisturizer for a vibrant skin! Elizavecca Witch Piggy Hell Pore Control Hyaluronic Acid 97% provides moisture to your skin. It features 97% of hyaluronic acid, the substance that exists in human body and it retains moisture from skin's uppermost layers down to its dermis layer. By regulating proper hydration level of pores, it helps solving pore problems and makes your skin glow. With non-sticky formula, it does not leave a greasy feeling.

data.name: The INKEY List Salicylic Acid Cleanser
data.description: A lightly-foaming cleanser that removes makeup and dirt, helping to reduce blackheads, acne, and blemishes while unclogging pores.

data.name: Etude House SoonJung 5.5 Foam Cleanser
data.description: A low pH cleanser helps maintain your skin's pH and can help protect your moisture barrier. It's a foaming cleanser that lathers well to gently remove impurities and contains hydrates skin with moisturizing ingredients.

data.name: The INKEY List Hyaluronic Acid Cleanser
data.description: An intensely hydrating cleanser with a lightly foaming formula that removes makeup and continues to hydrate after use for soft, smooth, healthy-looking skin

data.name: e.l.f. cosmetics Holy Hydration! Face Cream
data.description: For a powerful boost of hydration to the face and luminous skin, this award-winning facial moisturizer is great for dry skin and does it all. It’s packed with skin-loving ingredients that even out skin tone and replenish lost moisture for a firmed up, bouncy complexion. Great for daytime and nighttime use, the non-greasy face cream quickly sinks into the skin for a smooth, super-soft feel.

data.name: e.l.f. cosmetics Holy Hydration! Face Cream Fragrance Free
data.description: For a powerful boost of hydration to the face and luminous skin, indulge in the fragrance-free version of our award-winning moisturizing face cream. It’s packed with skin-loving ingredients that even out skin tone and replenish lost moisture for a firmed up, bouncy complexion. Great for daytime and nighttime use even on sensitive skin, the non-greasy formula quickly sinks into the skin for a smooth, super-soft feel.

data.name: Glow Recipe Plum Plump™ Hyaluronic Acid Serum
data.description: A hydrating serum with juicy plum and five weights of hyaluronic acid that fills skin with hydration for a visibly plump effect.

data.name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser
data.description: A gentle cleansing product formulated to target makeup removal whilst leaving the skin feeling smooth and moisturized. The formula incorporates Squalane, alongside other lipophilic esters that are gentle, moisturizing, efficient in dissolving makeup and facial impurities and increasing the spreadability of the product. When rubbed between your palms for approximately 10-30 seconds, the product undergoes an important textural change from a balm-like consistency to a clear oil-like consistency. This allows the emulsifying sucrose esters in the formula to trap and blend the dissolved makeup and facial impurities with water for rinsing. Being non-comedogenic and soap-free, this formula is designed to be gentle enough for daily use, without over-drying the skin, making it suitable for all skin types.

data.name: Hada Labo Gokujyn Hyaluronic Acid Cleansing Foam
data.description: Effortlessly remove sebum, oil, and dirt without completely drying your skin out. This hydrating cleanser foams up to help better remove impurities, but also contains a humectant to help hydrate your skin.

data.name: Pixi Beauty Retinol Tonic
data.description: A youth-preserving toner for hydrated, fresh looking skin. Turn back time with this rejuvenating skin toner. The miracle formula is packed with powerful antioxidants and botanicals (such as jasmine flower) to recondition the skin and permeate each and every pore. Rebuilding damaged moisture barriers and locking-in moisture, the silky soft toner works even in minimal doses. Smoother, softer skin in no time!

data.name: La Roche-Posay Physiological Soothing Lotion
data.description: PH-balanced and soothing for sensitive face and eyes, this toner gently cleanses face from make-up, oil and other impurities while maintaining skin’s physiological balance. Formulated with La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water that's rich in antioxidant selenium and Glycerin for moisturizing properties. Gentle even on the most sensitive skin, this toner leaves the skin soft and comfortable.

data.name: OMI Sun Bears Strong Cool Plus Sunblock SPF 50+ PA++++
data.description: OMI Sun Bears Strong Cool Plus is an ultra-cooling Japanese sunscreen milk for outdoor activities and sports.

data.name: SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Air-Fit Suncream Plus SPF 50+ PA++++
data.description: An ultra lightweight physical sunscreen with a broad spectrum delivers matte finish and Centella Asiatic Extract soothes skin and balances uneven skin tone.

data.name: A'Pieu Pure Block Waterproof Sun Cream SPF 50+ PA+++
data.description: Pure Block sun care line formulated with gentle ingredients offer UV Protection to protect delicate skin without irritation.

data.name: Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Toner
data.description: A gentle, non-stinging formula that won’t strip facial skin of its natural moisturizers.

data.name: Elizavecca Milky Piggy Sun Cream SPF 50+ PA+++
data.description: Give your skin adequate protection when you engage in outdoor activities! This long-wearing sun cream offers SPF50+ PA+++ protection alongside improving wrinkles, whitening complexion and controlling sebum.

data.name: The INKEY List Tranexamic Acid Hyperpigmentation Treatment
data.description: An overnight treatment that helps target the appearance of hyperpigmentation and dark spots for a more even skin tone.

data.name: Skin Aqua UV Super Moisture Milk SPF 50+ PA++++
data.description: This sun milk doubles as a makeup base, thanks to its highly waterproof and sweat-resistant formula enriched with moisturizing ingredients. Suitable for face and body, it’s also easily removable with soap. Available in the original version as well as a pink version which boasts a tone-up effect.

data.name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Purifying Foaming Face Gel
data.description: Our best cleanser for treating acne-prone and oily skin on the face and body without over drying or causing irritations. Effaclar Purifying Foaming Gel cleanser removes impurities, rebalances the skin and is suitable for the most sensitive skin. This oil-free acne cleanser rebalances sebum production and reduces clogged pores to reveal clean smooth and healthy skin. It can be used on face, body, chest, back and scalp. The lightweight, clear gel formula spreads effortlessly on the skin and foams easily, for a refreshing feeling on the skin.

data.name: Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser
data.description: Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser is a mild, soap-free formula that cleanses without irritation. It protects the skin’s natural protective oils and natural pH to moisturize and soothe sensitive skin as it cleans. Gentle enough for baby’s delicate skin or as a makeup remover.

data.name: COSRX Aloe Soothing Sun Cream SPF 50+ PA+++
data.description: Formulated with Aloe Arborescens Leaf Extract, the daily soothing sunblock is so lightweight that is feels like a moisturizer, and it does not leave any white cast.

data.name: Etude House SoonJung Centella 6.5 Whip Cleanser
data.description: The Etude House Soon Jung SoonJung Centella 6.5 Whip Cleanser is formulated with  Panthenol, madecassoside, and Centella Asiatica Leaf extracts to protect and soothe the skin while cleansing. The cleanser lathers into a rich foam to minimize irritation to the skin. Suitable for all skin types. Recommended for sensitive skin.

data.name: COSRX Hydrium Triple Hyaluronic Moisture Cleanser
data.description: A mega hydrating cleanser formulated with 3 kinds of hyaluronic acid to replenish and lock in moisture while washing away dirt and oil. Like a big drink of water for your skin, refreshing.

data.name: COSRX BHA Blackhead Power Liquid
data.description: Fight persistent acne and hopefully never see a pimple again! This cult favourite cleansing toner contains 4% BHA, penetrating deep inside the pores to clear away dead skin and pore-clogging impurities. Your next leap toward clear and smooth skin.

data.name: Canmake Mermaid Skin Gel UV SPF 50+ PA++++ (01 Clear)
data.description: Splash it on like a facial lotion - also serves as a make-up base. Can also be used after your usual facial lotion & other skincare products. Serves as a moisturizing make-up base with UV protection.

data.name: COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Intensive Cream
data.description: This intensely hydrating cream is formulated with sodium hyaluronate and sea buckthorn oil to strengthen the skin barrier and slow signs of aging. Suitable for dry skin.

data.name: Missha All-around Safe Block Aqua Sun Gel SPF 50+ PA++++
data.description: Strengthened with SPF50+ PA+++ that blocks both UVA and UVB rays, Missha All-around Safe Block Aqua Sun Gel SPF50+ PA++++ comes in a lightweight and non-sticky gel formulation that feels refreshing on skin. Contains ice plant, glacial water, antozone-rose and thanaka extracts to refresh, moisturize and reduce blemishes on skin. Apply regularly. Water- and sweat-resistant formulation.

data.name: Etude House Moistfull Collagen Cleansing Foam
data.description: A renewed version of the classic Etude House Moistfull Collagen Cleansing Foam. This cleanser contains collagen to hydrate and restore skin, and it lathers into a gentle foam that effectively removes makeup and impurities without stripping the skin of its natural oils.

data.name: Differin Oil Absorbing Moisturizer with Sunscreen SPF 30
data.description: This lightweight, hypoallergenic formula was developed by dermatologists to provide SPF 30 UVA/UVB protection without clogging the pores. Micropearl technology absorbs surface oil for a matte finish while the oil-free formulation moisturizes without leaving the skin feeling greasy or sticky.

data.name: PURITO Deep Sea Pure Water Cream
data.description: This lightweight moisturizing cream is made with 60% deep sea water. PURITO's Deep Sea Pure Water Cream refreshes dry skin and is formulated with ingredients to brighten and smooth for a youthful glow.
ingredients: sodium acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl taurate copolymer (viscosity increasing agents)

data.name: Cetaphil Pro Oil Absorbing Moisturizer SPF 30
data.description: Hydrate, reduce shine and protect skin from the sun's damaging rays with this lightweight 3-in-1 facial moisturizer. Clinically proven to absorb excess oil and reduce shine, this oil free lotion won't clog pores or leave skin feeling greasy. Delivers 24-hour hydration for balanced, healthy-looking skin. Cetaphil PRO DermaControl™ Oil Absorbing Moisturizer is part of a regimen that is clinically proven to manage oily skin.

data.name: iUNIK Calendula Complete Cleansing Oil
data.description: Cleanse gently and completely with natural oils derived from calendula flowers, canola, sunflowers, jojoba, Queensland nut, and cananga odorata. A gentle and powerful oil-based cleanser as the first part of your Korean skincare routine. Melt away stubborn makeup and excess sebum with this nourishing and soothing cleanser.

data.name: Klairs Supple Preparation Unscented Toner
data.description: Amino acids, hyaluronic acid, and plant extracts provide all the hydration strength of the original in a light, watery consistency that absorbs quickly into the skin. This toner forgoes possibly irritating essential oils for those with super sensitive skin looking for deep hydration.

data.name: Banila Co. Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm (Original)
data.description: Clean it Zero-Cleansing Balm Original is a hypoallergenic cleanser that transforms from sherbet-like texture into smooth oil when applied onto your skin. It is formulated to remove waterproof make-up and even excess oil and dirt all in one simple step. Banila Co Zero Balance Technology deep - cleanses and mildly exfoliates without stripping the skin, and leaves the skin hydrated and fresh.

data.name: Heimish All Clean Green Foam Cleanser
data.description: Maintains skin's optimal pH balance to effectively remove dirt and other impurities from deep within the pores. Formulated with Centella Asiatica and witch hazel to soothe and promote skin-healing.

data.name: DHC Deep Cleansing Oil
data.description: DHC's bestselling, cult-classic Deep Cleansing Oil is truly one of a kind. The original Japanese first step oil cleanser melts away makeup and dissolves impurities, leaving your skin clean, soft and radiant.

data.name: Etude House SoonJung 10-Free Moist Emulsion
data.description: Soothe and repair stressed out skin with SoonJung gentle skin emulsion, revamped for 2021. A minimal irritant formulation with ingredients like cica and madecassoside gently nourish and calm the skin.

data.name: e.l.f. Superhydrate Moisturizer
data.description: Give thirsty skin what it craves with this skin-quenching, fast-absorbing gel moisturizer. Infused with plant-derived Squalane, a natural oil that balances moisture and maintains elasticity, this lightweight gel quickly seeps into the skin for smooth, non-greasy hydration. The result is hydrated, bouncy, plump-looking skin.

data.name: e.l.f. Holy Hydration! Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
data.description: Watch your makeup melt away! A 2-in-1 makeup remover and face cleanser that instantly melts away your makeup while removing impurities and cleansing the skin. Its solid  balm form melts into a luxurious oil and turns into a nourishing milk texture that rinses off clean. Formulated with skin-loving ingredients hyaluronic acid, ceramides and peptides.

data.name: e.l.f. Superclarify Cleanser
data.description: Makeup, dirt, and oil don't stand a chance against this gentle yet effective clarifying cleanser. This gel cleanser creates a gentle foam that lifts impurities from the skin, reveling a clean, smooth complexion. Niacinamide infusion helps prevent clogged pores and helps to strengthen the skin.

data.name: e.l.f. Holy Hydration! Daily Cleanser
data.description: A gel-based, soft foaming cleanser helps wash away excess oil, impurities and make-up. This hydrating cleanser contains skin loving ingredients hyaluronic acid and ceramides, leaving the skin feeling moisturized, clean and healthy-looking-you won't want to live without it!

data.name: iUNIK Beta-Glucan Power Moisture Serum
data.description: All Day Long Hydration: iUNIK Beta-glucan moisture serum is formulated with 98% beta glucan, mushroom yeast extract. The moisturizing serum has zero irritating stuff and no alcohol in the formula. The serum provides all day and night-long moisturization. The facial serum helps to restore hydration and fight signs of aging. The hydrating formula will be absorbed deeply through the layer of skin in seconds without clogging pores or heavy feeling.

data.name: MUJI Sensitive Skin Oil Cleanser
data.description: Sensitive skin-friendly cleansing oil that uses olive oil as the main ingredient. Perfect as a first step to remove makeup and sunscreen. This item is Synthetic Fragrance-Free, Paraben-Free, Colouration Free, Alcohol-Free, and Mineral Oil Free.

data.name: Etude House SoonJung pH 6.5 Whip Cleanser
data.description: Etude House's best-selling Whip Cleanser! A whipped-cream textured cleanser with a low pH that moisturizes and cleanses any impurities from the skin. Panthenol and madecassoside repairs damaged and irritated skin and reduces any skin irritation. For beautifully soft, clear skin, add this cleanser to your routine!

data.name: Heimish All Clean Balm
data.description: A cleansing balm with a sherbet consistency effortlessly melts away makeup, dirt, and other impurities, without stripping the skin. Leaves skin hydrated and all clean. The perfect first step in a double cleansing routine for individuals with sensitive skin.

data.name: iUNIK Beta Glucan Daily Moisture Cream
data.description: Enter K-beauty's new god-ingredient: beta-glucan—a multi-functional and extraordinarily powerful humectant and moisturizer that also brightens and plumpens. Fruit extract revitalizes dull skin, while centella and aloe vera act as calming agents. This product is a terrific moisturizer for any skin type; keep your skin velvety and hydrated with iUNIK's Beta Glucan Daily Moisture Cream.

data.name: Pond's Dry Skin Cream Facial Moisturizer
data.description: Our unique blend of moisturizers significantly reduces dryness, strengthening skin from the inside to give you soft and hydrated skin on the outside.

data.name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream
data.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides all-day hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-ii). the formula also contains hyaluronic acid to help retain skin's natural moisture.

data.name: LION Pair Acne Cream W
data.description: This topical cream effectively treats acne from the root through the combined action of anti-inflammatory agent IPPN (ibuprofen piconol) and antibacterial agent IPMP (isopropylmethylphenol). The cream becomes transparent when spread thinly over the affected area so you can use it even when you go out. A pH close to that of the skin and a light, refreshing plant fragrance keep your skin comfortable. Apply on affected area several times a day after cleansing.

data.name: First Aid Beauty Facial Radiance Niacinamide Dark Spot Serum
data.description: A gentle, niacinamide-powered serum that reduces the look of dark spots, sunspots, hyperpigmentation, discoloration, and post-blemish marks.

data.name: e.l.f. Nourishing Facial Oil
data.description: This nourishing facial oil helps to moisturize and feed the skin with radiance-inducing ingredients like Rose, Avocado, and Grape Seed oil.

data.name: Drunk Elephant A-Passioni™ Retinol Cream
data.description: A clean, cutting-edge formula with 1.0% vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.

data.name: Drunk Elephant C-Firma™ Fresh Day Serum
data.description: A potent 15 percent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve the signs of photoaging.

data.name: Pond's Cold Cream Make-Up Remover
data.description: Melts away even the most stubborn waterproof make-up. Infuses skin with vital moisture, leaving skin instantly softer and smoother.

data.name: Topicals Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration
data.description: A gel-like serum that reduces the look of stubborn marks, scars, and spots.

data.name: Drunk Elephant B-Hydra™ Intensive Hydration Serum
data.description: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.

data.name: e.l.f. Supertone Toner
data.description: Dull, lackluster skin meet the e.l.f. SuperTone Toner, a gently daily face toner that helps remove dead skin cells to reveal a more radiant, bright complexion. This chemical exfoliant is powered by glow-inducing glycolic acid, an Alpha Hydroxy Acid with low pH that helps tone, balance and clear skin. SuperTone Toner is recommended for normal, dry, oily, and combination skin. SuperTone Toner is not recommended for sensitive skin.

data.name: Paula's Choice C15 Super Booster
data.description: This concentrated booster with 15% pure vitamin C dramatically brightens uneven skin while improving the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines.

data.name: e.l.f. Holy Hydration! Eye Cream
data.description: A hydrating eye cream that helps smooth and refresh the eye area. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, peptides and vegan collagen known to help moisturize, smooth and plump the skin. The non-greasy and fast-absorbing formula is ideal to wear under makeup - leaving your eyes looking like they had a full night's rest!
